caption.p: Chemical structure of the compounds: Groups of compounds include ( A) inhibitors of adenosine triphosphate (ATP) synthesis (Antimycin A), ( B) apoptosis inducers (OSU-03012 and Obatoclax), ( C) inhibitors of orotidine monophosphate decarboxylase (OMPD), which catalyzes key steps in pyrimidine synthesis (Azaribine, Azauridine, and Pyrazofurin), ( D) inhibitors of inosine monophosphate dehydrogenase (IMPDH) that inhibit replication of RNA and DNA via GTP reduction (Mycophenolate mofetil, Mycophenolic acid, and AVN-944), ( E) inhibitors of dihydroorotate dehydrogenase (DHODH) that is a key enzyme of the pyrimidine biosynthesis pathway (Brequinar). ( F) The JAK2 and STAT5 activator Aurintricarboxylic acid (ATA) was used as a positive control since it has been previously shown to have antiviral activity against ZIKV.
